name: 99 Gorillas
description:
It's all out Gorilla Warfare!

The gorillas have organized and only one man can stop them. Defeat all 99 gorillas to upgrade your weapon and take on the next wave.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Click - Shoot

Space - Dodge

This 64x64 resolution game was built in two weeks for the 2021 LOWREZJAM.
